scripts.pre-release:changelog:commit: git add packages/**/CHANGELOG.md && (git commit -nm 'chore(release): Update CHANGELOG files' || echo 'No updates in CHANGELOG files')
scripts.pre-release:changelog: npm run pre-release:changelog:generate && npm run pre-release:changelog:commit
scripts.pre-release:done-msg: echo '\033[96mPlease make sure the updated versions and tags are correct, then execute \033[95m"npm run release"\033[96m to publish new versions to npm and push to origin\033[0m'
scripts.pre-release: npm run pre-release:verify-branch && npm run pre-release:bump && npm run pre-release:changelog && npm run pre-release:done-msg
